name: CONDUIT
description:
CONDUIT is an interactive music visualizer. This is the point where music and visuals merge into one. 

In the world of generative music, melodies and themes are generated based on some rules set by the composer-developer, which in turn gives the music some structure. The melodic pitches in CONDUIT are completely random, and the structure/cohesiveness is achieved by attaching a certain amount of notes to an action—eg. jumping = 3 notes and collision = 1 note. The result is a kind of organized chaos.

The music changes dynamically as you progress through the world, and the music in turn changes various visual elements like screen shake and a glitch-effect shader I wrote.

Controls:

Movement: WASD Jump: Spacebar Pulse: Left Click/E
